urlText: George St, Parramatta, temporary bus stop closure
content:
From 8pm Friday 1 October to 5am Monday 1 November 2021, private development work will result in the following bus stop closures:
  • George St at Church St (2150105) will be closed.
    The alternative stop will be Smith St before Phillip St (215066).
  • Parramatta Stadium, O’Connell St (2150381) will be closed.
    The alternative stop will be Victoria Rd before Marist Place (2150110).
  • Marist Place opposite Saint Patrick’s Cathedral (2150250) will be closed.
    The alternative stop will be Victoria Rd after Villiers St (2150108).
  • Phillip St after Church St (2150377) will be closed.
    The alternative stop will be Parramatta Wharf, Phillip St (215041).
subtitle: George St, Parramatta, temporary bus stop closure

lines.name: Sydney Buses Network 900
lines.description: Parramatta Free Shuttle

urlText: Park St, Sydney CBD, temporary bus stop closure
content:
From 10pm Monday 11 October to 5am Tuesday 12 October 2021, Sydney Metro work at the future Pitt St station site will result in the closure of bus stop Town Hall Station, Park St, Stand G (2000426).

The alternative stop will be Town Hall Station, Park St, Stand H (2000249) and affect the 311 route towards Railway Square and the 324 and 325 routes towards Watsons Bay.
subtitle: Park St, Sydney CBD, temporary bus stop closure

urlText:
19:08 Casino to Brisbane service cancellation
14:40 Brisbane to Casino service cancellation
content:
NSW TrainLink advises that Queensland has declared most of NSW a hotspot. NSW TrainLink coach services to and from Brisbane have been cancelled.

Use the Trip Planner for the latest travel information with real time updates.
subtitle:

urlText:
19:20 Casino to Robina service alteration
16:00 Robina to Casino service alteration
content:
NSW TrainLink advises that Queensland has declared most of NSW a hotspot. NSW TrainLink coach services will terminate at Tweed Heads.

Due to the Queensland Border Closure, the 19:20 CLK171 Casino to Robina service will terminate at Tweed Heads. No travel will be provided between Tweed Heads and Robina.

The 16:00 CLK174 Robina to Casino service will commence at Tweed Heads. No travel will be provided between Robina and Tweed Heads. 

Use the Trip Planner for the latest travel information with real time updates.
subtitle:
19:20 Casino to Robina service alteration
16:00 Robina to Casino service alteration

urlText:
02:36 Casino to Surfers Paradise service alteration
05:00 Surfers Paradise to Casino service alteration
content:
NSW TrainLink advises that Queensland has declared most of NSW a hotspot. NSW TrainLink services will terminate at Tweed Heads.
The 02:36 CLK163 Casino to Surfers Paradise service will terminate at Tweed Heads. No travel will be provided between Tweed Heads and Surfers Paradise. 
The 05:00 CLK164 Surfers Paradise to Casino service will commence at Tweed Heads. No travel will be provided between Surfers Paradise and Tweed Heads. 

Use the Trip Planner for the latest travel information with real time updates.
subtitle:

urlText: Darcy Rd, temporary bus stop closure
content: From 8pm Friday 15 October to 6am Monday 18 October 2021, Parramatta Light Rail work will result in the closure of bus stop Darcy Rd after Hawkesbury Rd (214518) and affect the 705 and 711 routes towards Blacktown. The alternative stop will be at Westmead Hospital, North West T-way (2145560).
subtitle: Darcy Rd, temporary bus stop closure

urlText: Route will be withdrawn from Sunday 18 October
content:
From Sunday 18 October this route will be withdrawn with existing trips converted to route 607X services between the City and Bella Vista.

If you are travelling from the City beyond Bella Vista, you can still use the Nightride N92.

Please see the North West and North Shore Sydney bus service changes news article for more details.
subtitle: Route will be withdrawn from Sunday 18 October

urlText: Route and timetable changes from Sunday 18 October
content:
From Sunday 18 October this route will have route and timetable changes.

The route will be truncated between Kellyville and Castle Hill on weekdays. All services will still operate between Castle Hill and the City.

Alternative travel options between Kellyville and Castle Hill are available on routes 601, 626, 632, 633 and 715, providing connects to Sydney Metro or other bus services at Hills Showground or Castle Hill Stations.

Please see the North West and North Shore Sydney bus service changes news article for more details.
subtitle: Route and timetable changes from Sunday 18 October

urlText: 14:45 Wagga to Condobolin Town and 07:25 Condobolin Town to Wagga coach service alteration.
content:
Due to local flooding, these services will not pick up or set down at Euabalong or Euabalong West. Passengers are asked to board the service at Lake Cargelligo.

Use the Trip Planner for the latest travel information with real time updates.
subtitle: 14:45 Wagga to Condobolin Town and 07:25 Condobolin Town to Wagga coach service alteration.

urlText: L1 Dulwich Hill Line full closure
content:
From 6am to 11pm Monday 24 October 2021, buses will replace L1 Dulwich Hill Line light rail services between Central Grand Concourse and Dulwich Hill, due to essential planned maintenance works.

The L2 Randwick Line and L3 Kingsford Line will continue to run as per normal schedule.

Normal full light rail services will resume at 6am Monday 25 October.
subtitle: L1 Dulwich Hill Line full closure
